item.title: Cats & Cups
item.description:
Title: Cats & Cups
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Rogue Duck Interactive
Publisher: Rogue Duck Interactive
Franchise: RDI Strategy Games
Release Date: Nov 1, 2025




About This Game

Welcome to Cats & Cups! üê±‚òï

Step into the pawsitively purrfect world of *Cats & Cups*, a wholesome and cozy barista simulator where your customers are charming, quirky cats! Brew delicious drinks, play delightful mini-games, and discover heartwarming stories ‚Äî all in a beautifully hand-drawn caf√© filled with feline charm.

Serve Up Purrfection

Take orders from your furry clientele and learn to prepare everything from classic coffee to meow-gical specialty drinks. Master the art of crafting complex beverages to satisfy even the pickiest catstomers. Each drink has its own mini-game challenge, making every order feel fun and rewarding.

Meet the Cats

Your caf√© attracts cats from all walks of life ‚Äî curious kittens, retired lion-hearted adventurers, bookish tabbies, and more. Get to know their unique personalities and stories as they keep coming back for their favorite brew and a cozy chat.

Upgrade and Customize Your Caf√©

Decorate your coffee shop with adorable furniture, cute decorations, and cozy lighting to create a warm atmosphere that keeps catstomers coming. Unlock new areas, expand your menu, and grow your caf√© into the ultimate feline hangout.

Wholesome Vibes & Hand-Drawn Art

Every corner of Cats & Cups is lovingly illustrated with cozy, hand-drawn art that radiates warmth and charm. Whether you‚Äôre serving drinks, chatting with cats, or tending the counter, the peaceful vibe will make you want to stay just a little longer.

Features

- üêæ Brew coffee, tea, and specialty drinks for cat customers
- üéÆ Mini-games tied to each drink recipe
- üè† Customize and decorate your caf√©
- üìñ Unlock new stories, drinks, and upgrades
- üé® Wholesome, cozy hand-drawn visuals
- üòª Meet dozens of unique catstomers with charming personalities

Ready to pour some purrfection?

Put on your apron, warm up the espresso machine, and make your caf√© the cat‚Äôs meow. Whether you‚Äôre in it for the stories, the drinks, or the fluffy friendships, *Cats & Cups* is your next cozy escape.

item.title: SEVERANCE
item.description:
Title: SEVERANCE
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Sykes Games
Publisher: Sykes Games
Release Date: Oct 31, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Oct 31, 2025




About This Game

SEVERANCE

Severance is a 1‚Äì5 player online co-op horror where one of you becomes the Ghost, and the rest must investigate, survive, and escape.

üßü Play as The Ghost

YOU are the ghost

Create terrifying moments, interact with the entire map to create unique scary scenarios, throw objects, lock doors, hunt and much more to mess with the investigators, all while draining their sanity, to allow you to begin hunts, chasing them down one by one until there are none left...

üîé Play as the Investigator

Use classic paranormal tools to gather real evidence on the ghost, find evidence to figure out who they really are. Be aware, they see and hear you. They will scare you to break you down, use this to your advantage as they will give evidence doing this

üéß Immersive Horror
Severance features realistic visuals, environmental audio, and a minimal UI for total immersion. Every sound, shadow, and flicker could be a clue or a warning

üõ† Signature Equipment
Arm yourself with classic paranormal tools, EMF meters, Thermometers, and other unique devices such as possession dolls to uncover evidence and track the entity‚Äôs movements.

ü§ù True Co-op
Success relies on teamwork. Share discoveries, and watch each other‚Äôs backs, because you never know what the ghost will do next

AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

Some minor visual elements such as parts of the logo design and a few user-interface textures were originally assisted by generative tools and then refined manually.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 or better
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580 or better
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Dedicated (for better 3D sound effects)

item.title: Echoes of the Living
item.description:
Title: Echoes of the Living
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , Early Access
Developer: MoonGlint
Publisher: MoonGlint
Release Date: Oct 31, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Oct 31, 2025




About This Game

Echoes of the Living is a Survival Horror with fixed cameras inspired by the 90's greatest hits but with updated visuals and fully 3D environments with current gen graphics.

STORY

In 1996, on a quiet small town located in Europe, a mysterious fog suddenly rises upon the town in a clear night, their inhabitants have no clue of the horrors and chaos that were about to unleash.

Not longer after, the locals get sick and panic runs all over the place, nobody knows how or why the dead walks on the streets, a few hours later all left in the town are the echoes of the living‚Ä¶

MEET THE CAST

Laurel Reaves, a police officer faces the horror from the beginning, her goal is to investigate the fate of her father with the help of Marcus Wallace and escape the infection .

Liam Oakwood, an ex Special Forces member arrives to the town where he was about to move in and start a new life with his fianc√©e Octavia Blade, he couldn‚Äôt imagine that this would be in the worst moment, his goal is to find his fianc√©e and together leave behind the horror.

The protagonists are tied up in the hell on earth the city has become, they have to collaborate to discover what‚Äôs going on and make it out alive.

GAME FEATURES

¬∑ Fixed Camera Angles

¬∑ Classic Tank Control (character relative) or Modern Control (camera relative)

¬∑ Puzzles

¬∑ Limited inventory management

¬∑ Backtracking

¬∑ Save Room and Item Storage

¬∑ Multiple stories with their own point of view

¬∑ All types of enemies from blood thirsty zombies, mutated fauna to other nightmare fuel creatures

¬∑ Fully 3D environments with current gen graphics

¬∑ Walk over dark and bloody streets, shady exteriors, emblematic buildings such as the Hospital, Art Gallery, the City Hall, the Theatre‚Ä¶ and try to find out what‚Äôs going on

¬∑ Wide arsenal to adapt to your playstyle

¬∑ Weapon and equipment upgrades to reward the player

¬∑ In game unlockables

¬∑ Immersive OST inspired by the Classics

ABOUT US

We are a young couple that following our passion left everything to work full time on the development of this game, we want to bring back memories from the 90s to modern times

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains scenes of explicit violence and gore



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: WINDOWS¬Æ 10 (64-BIT)
    • Processor: Intel¬Æ Core‚Ñ¢ i5-4460 3.2GHz or AMD FX‚Ñ¢-8350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA¬Æ GeForce¬Æ GTX 960 or AMD Radeon‚Ñ¢ R9 380 with 4GB VRAM
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 24 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: WINDOWS¬Æ 10 (64-BIT)
    • Processor: : Intel¬Æ Core‚Ñ¢ i5-8600k 3.6GHz or AMD Ryzen‚Ñ¢ 5 2600x or better
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA¬Æ GeForce¬Æ GTX 1660 Super or AMD Radeon‚Ñ¢ RX Vega-56 or better with 6GB VRAM
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 42 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

item.title: Flesh Made Fear
item.description:
Title: Flesh Made Fear
Genre: Action , Indie
Developer: Tainted Pact
Publisher: Assemble Entertainment
Release Date: Oct 31, 2025




About This Game

Dare to Survive

From the creators of indie horror hits Massacre at the Mirage , Suffer the Night , and Terror at Oakheart , comes Flesh Made Fear , the ultimate survival horror experience by Tainted Pact Games.

Descend into a world of horrifying experiments and occult rituals where every step plunges you deeper into madness. Featuring the survival mechanics that define the genre, reimagined with heart-stopping innovations, this game invites you to confront your fears like never before.

Will you face the nightmare? Or will the nightmare consume you?

Classic Horror, Reimagined

Flesh Made Fear pays homage to the PSX-era survival horror that defined a generation. Drawing inspiration from the original Resident Evil trilogy, it masterfully blends intricate puzzles, heart-pounding combat, and a dread-filled atmosphere. But this isn‚Äôt just a nostalgic throwback‚Äîit‚Äôs a bold evolution. Modernized controls, immersive cinematics, and a gripping story will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very last moment.

Take on the role of an elite operative in the Reaper Intervention Platoon (R.I.P.), a covert task force deployed to neutralize Victor ‚ÄúThe Dripper‚Äù Ripper‚Äîa brilliant but deranged former CIA agent. His sinister experiments have turned a desolate backwater town into a nightmare filled with grotesque monsters and mind-controlled thralls.

Your mission is clear: eliminate Ripper, unravel his chilling secrets, and survive the horrors lurking in his mansion-turned-laboratory.

Are you ready to step into the darkness?

Classic Survival Horror Meets Modern Innovations

  • Fixed and Dynamic Camera Angles : Relive the tension of classic fixed perspectives, seamlessly blending into modern rail and follow camera dynamics.

  • Limited Saves : Strategically save your progress using collectible items.

  • Inventory Management : Tactically manage limited inventory slots with access to safe room storage.

  • Puzzle-Driven Narrative : Engage with intricate puzzles intertwined with the story, unlocking hidden secrets and new areas.

Two Playable Characters

  • Choose between Natalie (less health, larger inventory) or Jack (greater health, smaller inventory).

  • Each character offers unique stats and storylines, enhancing replayability.

Terrifying Monsters & Arsenal

  • Face grotesque abominations born of Ripper‚Äôs twisted experiments.

  • Arm yourself with weapons like pistols and grenade launchers, but beware‚Äîammo is limited, challenging your resourcefulness.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains heavy depictions of blood, gore, horror, frightening scenes, violence, some nudity and is not suited for children and young people under the age of 18.

Action sequences involve violence against zombified humans and monsters.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8GHz / AMD Athlon X2 64 2.4GHz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or higher
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9600K CPU @ 3.70GHz or equivalent
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 or higher
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: Tales of Xillia Remastered
item.description:
Title: Tales of Xillia Remastered
Genre: Action , RPG
Developer: DOKIDOKI GROOVEWORKS, Inc.
Publisher: Bandai Namco Entertainment
Franchise: Bandai Namco Entertainment
Release Date: Oct 30, 2025




About This Game

Experience Tales of Xillia, remastered for the first time ever.

Dive into the magnificent world of Rieze Maxia as either Jude Mathis, an aspiring medical student from the capital, or Milla Maxwell, a mysterious woman accompanied by four powerful spirits.

Worlds Collide, Destiny Awaits

‚Ä¢ Two Heroes, One Destiny


Follow the paths of Milla and Jude as they embark on their daring journey through Rieze Maxia, a wondrous land where mankind and spirits coexist in harmony.

‚Ä¢ Partner Up with Dual Raid


Master the Dual Raid Linear Motion Battle System, mustering strategy and coordination to overcome action-packed battles in real-time combat. Team up with allies to unleash devastating combo attacks and unlock special support skills to overwhelm your foes.

‚Ä¢ Witness the Dramatic Story with High-Quality Animation


Visit the gorgeous Rieze Maxia, revitalized by beautifully-rendered illustrations and animations.

‚Ä¢ Quality of Life Upgrades


Explore with new quality-of-life updates including improved graphics, an auto-save feature, the ability to toggle encounters, early shop access, and more.

‚Ä¢ An All-Around Experience


Xillia Remastered contains DLC launched alongside the original release, including costumes, useful items, and other fun extras.



Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 3100
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti [1 GB] / AMD Radeon HD 5770 [1 GB] / Intel Arc A310 [4 GB]
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 19 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "Low". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 3100
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 [1 GB] / AMD Radeon HD 7770 [2 GB] / Intel Arc A310 [4 GB]
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 19 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "High". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. Windows 10 (Version 1809 or later) and a 4GB VRAM GPU (graphics board or video card) are required for DirectX 12 API.
